snippet: Jonathan Singer, a former podiatric surgeon, turned his photographs of rare flowers and plants into a new career. The second of a two-part show of his work is at the New Jersey State Museum.
abstract: Jonathan Singer, a former podiatric surgeon who has turned his photographs of rare flowers and plants into a new career, is featured in show Botanica Magnifica: Photographs by Jonathan Singer at the New Jersey State Museum in Trenton (Metropolitan/New Jersey).
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Singer, a former podiatric surgeon, turned his photographs of rare flowers and plants into a new career. The second of a two-part show of his work is at the New Jersey State Museum.

headline.seo: ‘Botanica Magnifica: Photographs by Jonathan Singer’ Is at the New Jersey State Museum
headline.main: Through the Lens, a Passion in Full Bloom
headline.print_headline: Through the Lens, A Passion in Full Bloom
